extendedInfo.description: Space Physics is a puzzle game with amazing physics. In this magical world, your hand drawings come to life: they become real physical objects. Want a car? Draw one and it can drive by itself!***ATTENTION***To save space, it contains only 1 level. Install and launch "Pack for Space Physics" (Free on market) to unleash sounds and 80 levels.

reviews.title: Stuck on level 47 for almost 2 years.
reviews.comment: About a month after the full version was released, i got stuck on level 47. Still cant solve it. But apparently can now skip it. Needs more levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Been playing on & off for a few weeks only 4 levels left. Really enjoy the intellectual element of this game. Other games by this developer are nowhere near the fun of this game, hope they release more like it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need more levels! I beat it months ago and I want more. It\'s addicting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FOR THOSE HAVING PROBLEMS accessing the...
reviews.comment: ...Levels Pack, you need to remember to OPEN the Levels Pack at least once after downloading it, before it can be uninstalled. It is only once it is first opened, that it actually gets copied from RAM to your SD card. Otherwise, this main game app can\'t find it because it only looks for the Levels Pack on your SD card, not in RAM. Remember to uninstall the Levels Pack after copying it to SD card, to free up your RAM! As to the game - I love it!  Shame it doesn\'t get much updating, because now other developers have taken its \"physics\" ideas & made more visually impressive games for our current crop of more powerful phones & tablets. That being said, sometimes simpler is better! [to Brandon & Gaurav : you CAN erase. Just double-tap on the object to erase]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very fun.
reviews.comment: It plays like a cheap clone of Crayon Physics. The levels aren\'t very fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Also great game for kids!
reviews.comment: Really like this, you can make any combination of objects you want so it promotes creative thought while you solve the puzzle! Also great game for kids!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: A very nice Crayon Physics clone-looks good & plays well. Only thing is the sound doesn\'t work, even after installing the pack :( Bargain on 10p sale
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, great price. All these 1 star ratings are from overcritical 10 cent sale buyers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr. W. Gordon
reviews.comment: You can test yourself by redoing the levels in different ways. It has some replay value if you look at it that way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Would love more levels and a sandbox mode. Makes me want a draw app that lets u draw stuff like a dial pad that actually works. Hire me!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor...
reviews.comment: The controls are terrible and the game itself isn\'t much fun. It would be worth it if the game recognized when you drew a circle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: I can\'t hear any music or sound from the game.. Isit normal or Isit just my phone?  samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept; needs work
reviews.comment: The interface is too imprecise to make game play effective & fun. e.g. attempting to draw a gear often results in a wheel or octagon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was working on Desire HD, now just gets stuck on white screen. Worked fine on my old Hero. Update: now fixed by author.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you have a huawei ascend, don\'t get this game, it runs all choppy and it\'s hard to draw straight lines for shapes. Huawei ascend= bad phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved the lite game. No idea how to install the pack, so got a refund. Don\'t know if android market is crap or this game setup is useless. Baffling :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: So addictive and wonderful, you wont be able to put it down! MAKE MORE GAME PACKS!

reviews.title: Awesome concept, bad execution
reviews.comment: This game could be great if the controls were usable. As it stands its nothing short of frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Original and fun but no sound and not updated.  Could be great. But got it on offer and well worth it.  Great concept, good game.
reviews.author: A Google User
